geminiQuestions.question: Which aspect of science excites you the most?
options: Applying scientific knowledge to solve real-world problems
Understanding the fundamental laws of nature

geminiQuestions.question: Imagine your ideal work environment. Which best describes it?
options: Quiet lab setting focused on individual research
Collaborative team working on a large project
Fast-paced startup environment with constant innovation
A mix of independent and collaborative work
